xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.1 Ganthaduka » 5.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.1.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 5.1.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
18.
1649Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1650Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
1651Gantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
19.
1652Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
1653Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
1654Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
20.
1655Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1656Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā noganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
1657Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
